title: Ping an Insurance 3Q Net Profit Rose 50% on Year
text:
By Yifan Wang

Ping An Insurance (Group) Co. of China Ltd. (2318.HK) said its third-quarter net profit rose 50% on year, helped by higher premiums and investment income.

The Chinese insurer's net profit for the July-to-September quarter was 31.89 billion yuan (US$4.51 billion), from CNY21.30 billion in the same period last year, it said.

Net earned premium grew 11% on year to CNY159.23 billion, while investment income rose 40%, the company said.

For the first nine months this year, net profit rose 63% on year to CNY129.57 billion, it added.
